metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11730 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_security_descriptor_values_free function in libfsntfs_security_descriptor_values.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (double-free) via a crafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libfsntfs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20190104-1').
